column2: Formulate an ontology related to land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "A defined area of the earth's surface." .:Terrain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Terrain" ;    rdfs:comment "The physical features of a tract of land." .:soilType a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "Soil Type" ;    rdfs:comment "The composition of soil in a land area." .:Elevation a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Terrain ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "Elevation" ;    rdfs:comment "The height above sea level." .:GeographicalFeature a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Geographical Feature" ;    rdfs:comment "Natural or artificial features on the surface of the earth." .:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicalFeature ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large elevated landform." .:River a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicalFeature ;    rdfs:label "River" ;    rdfs:comment "A natural flowing watercourse, usually freshwater." .:Lakes a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicalFeature ;    rdfs:label "Lakes" ;    rdfs:comment "An area filled with water, surrounded by land." .:LocatedIn a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :GeographicalFeature ;    rdfs:range :Land ;    rdfs:label "Located In" ;    rdfs:comment "Denotes the location of a geographical feature." .:Country a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Country" ;    rdfs:comment "A defined territory on land with its government." .:City a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "City" ;    rdfs:comment "A large and significant urban area." .:partOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :City ;    rdfs:range :Country ;    rdfs:label "Part Of" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the inclusion of a city within a country." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "The part of the Earth's surface that is not covered by water." .:Terrain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Terrain" ;    rdfs:comment "A stretch of land, especially with regard to its physical features." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:AgriculturalLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Agricultural Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land designated for agricultural use, including cultivating crops and raising livestock." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:UrbanLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Urban Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land designated for urban development, including cities and towns." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:Forest a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Forest" ;    rdfs:comment "A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:Desert a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Desert" ;    rdfs:comment "A barren area of landscape where little precipitation occurs and living conditions are hostile for plant and animal life." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large landform that rises prominently above its surroundings, generally exhibiting steep slopes, a confined summit area, and considerable height." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:LandUse a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "land use" ;    rdfs:comment "Describes the human modification of land areas for various uses." ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Land .:hasVegetation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has vegetation" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates if a land area has vegetation cover." ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Vegetation .:Vegetation a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Vegetation" ;    rdfs:comment "Plants considered collectively, especially those found in a particular area or habitat." .:SoilType a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "soil type" ;    rdfs:comment "The physical and chemical characteristics of the soil on a land area." ;    rdfs:domain :Land .:hasElevation a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "has elevation" ;    rdfs:comment "Describes the elevation of a land area above sea level." ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: land.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing an area of the earth's surface that is not covered by water."@en .:GeographicalFeature a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Geographical Feature"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing natural features of the Earth's surface."@en .:LandForm a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicalFeature ;    rdfs:label "Landform"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A recognizable natural feature of the earth's surface."@en .:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :LandForm ;    rdfs:label "Mountain"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level."@en .:Plain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :LandForm ;    rdfs:label "Plain"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A large area of flat or gently rolling land."@en .:Valley a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :LandForm ;    rdfs:label "Valley"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A low area of land between hills or mountains, often with a river running through it."@en .:HumanSettlement a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Human Settlement"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing places where humans establish communities."@en .:City a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :HumanSettlement ;    rdfs:label "City"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A large town, typically with a complex administrative, commercial, and social structure."@en .:Farm a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Farm"@en ;    rdfs:comment "An area of land and its buildings used for growing crops and rearing animals."@en .:Forest a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Forest"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth."@en .:hasLocation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has location"@en ;    rdfs:domain :HumanSettlement ;    rdfs:range :Land .:isPartOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "is part of"@en ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :GeographicalFeature .:isAdjacentTo a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "is adjacent to"@en ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Land .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/land#> .ex:LandEntity a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land Entity" .ex:NaturalLandform a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "Natural Landform" .ex:Mountains a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:label "Mountains" .ex:Plains a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:label "Plains" .ex:Forest a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "Forest" .ex:Waterbody a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "Waterbody" .ex:Lake a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Waterbody ;    rdfs:label "Lake" .ex:River a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Waterbody ;    rdfs:label "River" .ex:ManMadeStructure a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "Man-Made Structure" .ex:Road a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:ManMadeStructure ;    rdfs:label "Road" .ex:Building a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:ManMadeStructure ;    rdfs:label "Building" .ex:isPartOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:range ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "is part of" .ex:hasFeature a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:range ex:LandEntity ;    rdfs:label "has feature" .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/land#> .ex:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "The solid surface of the Earth, distinct from sea or air." .ex:NaturalLandform a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Natural Landform" ;    rdfs:comment "A naturally occurring area of land with a distinct topography." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Land .ex:ManMadeLandform a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Man-made Landform" ;    rdfs:comment "A human-modified or created structure on the land." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Land .ex:Continent a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Continent" ;    rdfs:comment "A large continuous expanse of land on Earth." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform .ex:Island a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Island" ;    rdfs:comment "A piece of land surrounded by water." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform .ex:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large natural elevation of the Earth's surface." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform .ex:Plain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Plain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large area of flat or gently rolling land." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:NaturalLandform .ex:UrbanArea a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Urban Area" ;    rdfs:comment "A human settlement with high population density and infrastructure." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:ManMadeLandform .ex:AgriculturalLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Agricultural Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land used for farming and growing crops." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:ManMadeLandform .ex:Road a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Road" ;    rdfs:comment "A broad path connecting different locations, used for transportation." ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:ManMadeLandform .ex:hasTerrainFeature a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has terrain feature" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Land ;    rdfs:range ex:NaturalLandform .ex:hasInfrastructure a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has infrastructure" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Land ;    rdfs:range ex:ManMadeLandform .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: land.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "A general class for all land types." .:NaturalLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Natural Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land that remains in its natural state." .:DevelopedLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:label "Developed Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land that has been altered by human activity." .:Forest a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLand ;    rdfs:label "Forest" ;    rdfs:comment "A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth." .:Desert a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLand ;    rdfs:label "Desert" ;    rdfs:comment "A barren area of landscape where little precipitation occurs." .:UrbanArea a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :DevelopedLand ;    rdfs:label "Urban Area" ;    rdfs:comment "A region surrounding a city, typically well-developed with infrastructure." .:AgriculturalLand a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :DevelopedLand ;    rdfs:label "Agricultural Land" ;    rdfs:comment "Land designated for agricultural activities." .:Grassland a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLand ;    rdfs:label "Grassland" ;    rdfs:comment "Areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses." .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/land#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "An area of the earth's surface under distinct ownership." .:Terrain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Terrain" ;    rdfs:comment "A stretch of land, especially with regard to its physical features." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:Ownership a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Ownership" ;    rdfs:comment "The state or fact of owning land." .:GeographicFeature a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Geographic Feature" ;    rdfs:comment "A naturally occurring landform like mountains or rivers related to the land." .:Country a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Country" ;    rdfs:comment "A distinct territorial body or political entity." .:hasOwner a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Ownership ;    rdfs:label "has owner" .:isPartOfTerrain a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Terrain ;    rdfs:label "is part of terrain" .:containsGeographicFeature a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Terrain ;    rdfs:range :GeographicFeature ;    rdfs:label "contains geographic feature" .:locatedInCountry a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :Country ;    rdfs:label "located in country" .:hasArea a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "has area" .:hasName a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :GeographicFeature ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has name" .:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large natural elevation of the earth's surface." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicFeature .:River a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "River" ;    rdfs:comment "A large, flowing body of water that usually empties into a sea or ocean." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GeographicFeature .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: land. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Land a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "A delineated area of the earth's surface." .:NaturalFeature a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Natural Feature" ;    rdfs:comment "A feature occurring naturally on the land." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:Waterbody a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Waterbody" ;    rdfs:comment "A naturally occurring accumulation of water." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalFeature .:Forest a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Forest" ;    rdfs:comment "A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalFeature .:Mountain a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:comment "A large landform that rises prominently above its surroundings." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalFeature .:HumanSettlement a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Human Settlement" ;    rdfs:comment "A community of people living in a particular land area." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land .:City a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "City" ;    rdfs:comment "A large human settlement, generally with extensive infrastructure." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :HumanSettlement .:Village a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Village" ;    rdfs:comment "A small human settlement, typically in a rural area." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :HumanSettlement .:hasLocation a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has location" ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :GeographicalLocation ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a land to its geographical location." .:GeographicalLocation a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Geographical Location" ;    rdfs:comment "A specific location defined by geographical coordinates." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: land.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/land#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Land rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "An area of the earth's surface that is owned, defined, or used." .:NaturalLandform rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Natural Landform" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:comment "Naturally occurring geographical features of land." .:ManmadeLandform rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Manmade Landform" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Land ;    rdfs:comment "Artificially created geographical features of land." .:Mountain rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Mountain" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:comment "A large natural elevation of the earth's surface." .:Valley rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Valley" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:comment "A low area of land between hills or mountains." .:Plain rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Plain" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:comment "A large area of flat or gently rolling land." .:UrbanArea rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Urban Area" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :ManmadeLandform ;    rdfs:comment "An area with high human population density and infrastructure." .:Park rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Park" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :ManmadeLandform ;    rdfs:comment "An area set aside for public recreation and enjoyment." .:hasFeature rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has Feature" ;    rdfs:domain :Land ;    rdfs:range :NaturalLandform ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a land area to its natural geographical features." .:isLocatedIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "is Located In" ;    rdfs:domain :ManmadeLandform ;    rdfs:range :Land ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a manmade landform to its geographical location." .```
